title: No industry / equipment, which generate any kind of RG noise, are permitted to operate within 1 km
clause_text: No industry / equipment, which generate any kind of RG noise, are permitted to operate within 1 km. Radius from unit boundary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
